system.requirements: Assassin or Scum Career, DH Rank 1+. Ballistic Skill 30+, must originate from Gunmetal City.
system.descriptionText: Gunslingers seek perfection in the art of the gun, be it through advanced cybernetics, mastercrafted weaponry, utter dedication and training, and so much more. Those above the rest are defined however by far darker things, those who have lived too long, killed too many, and who have nothing left but the pistol in their grip.
